alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 16 at 1:08AM MST until March 16 at 11:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall and runoff continues. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following county, Mohave. * WHEN...Until 1100 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 105 AM MST, gauge reports indicate the Beaver Dam Wash continues to experience higher than normal flows due to runoff from the earlier heavy rain. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Beaver Dam Wash, Virgin River, Castle Cliff Wash and Big Bend Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Beaver Dam and Littlefield. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
